phrase.translation: 使用内容感知调整图像大小
使用内容识别调整图层大小

phrase.original: Autosave could not be fully reconstructed. Partial reconstruction attempted instead.
phrase.translation: 自动保存不能完全恢复。

phrase.original: How would you like to load this image?
phrase.translation: 您希望如何加载此图像？

phrase.original: Open it as a standalone image.
Add it to the current image as a new layer.
phrase.translation: 作为新图层添加到当前图像。

phrase.original: I can't decide. Cancel this action.
phrase.translation: 我搞不明白，取消操作吧。

phrase.original: in the future, do this without asking me
ExifTool could not be started. Metadata unavailable for this session.
phrase.translation: ExifTool无法启动。元数据不可用。

phrase.original: Please wait while the tag database is created
phrase.translation: 请稍候，正在创建标签数据库

phrase.original: The tag database handles technical details of the 20,000+ metadata tags supported by PhotoDemon. Creating the database takes 10 to 15 seconds, and it only needs to be created once, when the metadata editor is used for the first time.
phrase.translation: 标签数据库处理20000+元数据标签支持的PhotoDemon技术细节。创建数据库需要10到15秒，当元数据编辑器第一次使用时，它只需要创建一次。

phrase.original: This image does not contain metadata.

Before lossless copies can be saved, you must save this image at least once.
Lossless copies will be saved to the same folder as this initial image save.
phrase.translation:
为了恢复以前丢失的副本，您必须保存此图像至少一次。
此副本将被保存到同一文件夹。

phrase.original:
An unspecified error occurred when attempting to save this image. Please try saving the image to an alternate format.
If the problem persists, please report it to the PhotoDemon developers via photodemon.org/contact
phrase.translation:
试图保存该图像时出现未知错误。请尝试将图像保存到一个备用格式。
如果问题仍然存在，请报告PhotoDemon开发者

phrase.original: Unfortunately, this PC does not have enough memory to create a %1x%2 image. Please reduce the requested size and try again.
phrase.translation: 没有足够的内存来创建图像 %1 x %2 ，请选择一个小点的图像大小后再试。

phrase.original: Counting the number of unique colors in this image
phrase.translation: 计算此图像中的唯一颜色数

phrase.original:
This image contains %1 unique colors (RGB).
This image contains %2 unique color + opacity values (RGBA).
phrase.translation:
此图像包含 %1 个唯一颜色（RGB）。
此图像包含 %2 个唯一颜色+不透明度值（RGBA）。

phrase.original: Image is all one color. Autocrop unnecessary.
phrase.translation: 图片是一种颜色，无需自动裁剪。

phrase.original: Image is already cropped intelligently. Autocrop abandoned. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: 图像已被智能裁剪。自动裁剪废弃。（没有改变图像。）

phrase.original: No active selection found. Crop abandoned.
phrase.translation: 没有活动的选择找到，放弃裁剪

phrase.original: Image is fully transparent. Trim abandoned.
phrase.translation: 图像是完全透明的，放弃裁剪。

phrase.original: Image is already trimmed. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: 图像已裁剪。（没有改变图像。）

phrase.original: %1 save failed. Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 保存失败。请使用帮助菜单->提交错误报告。

phrase.original: An error has occurred (#%1 - %2). PDI load abandoned.
phrase.translation: 发生一个错误（#%1 - 2%）。 取消打开PDI

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel %1?
This action will convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers, meaning you can no longer modify layer-specific settings like text, font, color or shape.
phrase.translation: 这个动作将文本和矢量图层转换成图像（栅格）图层，这意味着您不能再修改图层的特定设置，比如文字，字体，颜色或者形状。

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to continue?
Yes. Convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers.
phrase.translation: 是。转换文本和矢量图层图像（光栅）层。

phrase.original: No. Leave text and vector layers as they are.
phrase.translation: 否，保持文本层和矢量层不变。

phrase.original: This text layer will be changed to an image (raster) layer, meaning you can no longer modify its text or font settings.
phrase.translation: 这个文本层将被更改为一个图像（栅格）层，这意味着您不能再修改文本或字体设置。

phrase.original: Yes. Please convert this text layer.
phrase.translation: 是，请转换这个文本图层。

phrase.original: No. Leave this text layer as it is.

Unfortunately, the image '%1' could not be found.
If this image was originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
phrase.translation: 图像 '%1' 没有找到，如果源图像位于可移动媒体（DVD、USB驱动器等），请重新插入或重新连接媒体并再试一次。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the file '%1' is currently locked by another program on this PC.
Please close this file in any other running programs, then try again.
phrase.translation:
不幸的是，文件 '%1' 当前被该PC上的另一个程序锁定。
请在任何其他正在运行的程序中关闭此文件，然后重试。

phrase.original: This file has the extension "%1", but it is actually in "%2" format.
phrase.translation: 此文件的扩展名为“%1”，但实际上是“%2”格式。

phrase.original: May PhotoDemon rename the file with a correct extension?
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon可以用正确的扩展名重命名文件吗？

phrase.original: (If you choose "Yes", the file will be renamed to "%1")
phrase.translation: （如果选择“是”，文件将重命名为“%1”）

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it. Thanks!
phrase.translation: 很不幸，PhotoDemon无法加载以下图像： %1 请使用其它程序将该图像保存为通用图像格式（如JPEG或PNG），然后再加载。谢谢!

phrase.original: A third-party library (%1) reported the following error
phrase.translation: 第三方库（%1）报告了以下错误

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image(s):
%1 Please verify that these image(s) exist, and that they use a supported image format (like JPEG or PNG). Thanks!
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法加载下面的文件： %1 请检查图像文件是否存在，以及是否是软件支持的图像格式（如JPEG或PNG）。

phrase.original:
This macro does not contain any recordable actions. Are you sure you want to stop recording?
(Press No to continue recording.)
phrase.translation:
该宏不包含任何可记录的动作。要停止记录吗？
（按否继续记录。）

phrase.original:
If you do not save this macro, all actions recorded during this session will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to cancel?
(Press No to return to the Save Macro screen. Note that you can always delete this macro later if you decide you don't want it.)
phrase.translation:
如果您没有保存该宏，所有的行动，在这个会议记录将永久丢失。您确定要取消吗？
（按“取消”返回到保存宏屏幕。请注意，以后如果您决定不想要它，可以删除这个宏。）

phrase.original: Warning: last chance to save macro
phrase.translation: 警告：最后一个保存宏的机会

phrase.original: AVIF is a modern image format developed by the Alliance for Open Media. PhotoDemon does not natively support AVIF images, but it can download a free, open-source plugin that permanently enables AVIF support.
phrase.translation: AVIF是由开放媒体联盟开发的一种现代图像格式。PhotoDemon本机不支持AVIF图像，但它可以下载一个免费的开源插件，永久支持AVIF。

phrase.original: The Alliance for Open Media provides free, open-source 64-bit AVIF encoder and decoder libraries. These libraries are roughly ~%1 mb each (~%2 mb total). Once downloaded, they will allow PhotoDemon to import and export AVIF files on any 64-bit system.
phrase.translation: 开放媒体联盟提供免费的开源64位AVIF编码器和解码器库。这些库每个大约为 ~%1 mb（总共 ~%2 mb）。 下载后，它们将允许PhotoDemon在任何64位系统上导入和导出AVIF文件。

phrase.original: Would you like PhotoDemon to download these libraries to your PhotoDemon plugin folder?
phrase.translation: 是否希望PhotoDemon将这些库下载到PhotoDemon插件文件夹中？

phrase.original: PhotoDemon will not download the AVIF libraries at this time.
To manually enable AVIF support, you can download the latest copies of the free "%1" and "%2" programs and place them into your PhotoDemon plugin folder
phrase.translation: 要手动启用AVIF支持，您可以下载免费 "%1" 和 "%2" 程序的最新副本，并将其放入PhotoDemon插件文件夹中

phrase.original: These free libraries are always available at the Alliance for Open Media libavif release page
phrase.translation: 这些免费库在开放媒体联盟libavif发布页面上随时可用

phrase.original:
The selected scanner or digital camera isn't responding.
Please make sure the device is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation:
所选择的扫描仪或数码相机没有响应。
请确保该设备已打开并准备使用。

phrase.original:
The scanner/digital camera interface plug-in (EZTW32.dll) was marked as missing upon program initialization.
To enable scanner support, please copy the EZTW32.dll file (available for download from http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
扫描仪/数码相机接口插件（EZTW32.dll）标记为在程序初始化时失踪。
为了使扫描仪的支持，请在EZTW32.dll文件（可从http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm下载）复制到插件目录并重新加载该程序。

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Please make sure your scanner is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation: 发生未知错误。请确保您的扫描仪已打开并准备使用。

phrase.original: Scan successful, but temporary file save failed. Is it possible that your hard drive is full (or almost full)?
phrase.translation: 扫描成功！但保存临时文件失败。请检测您的硬盘驱动器是否已满。

phrase.original: Unable to acquire DIB lock. Please make sure no other programs are accessing the scanner. If the problem persists, reboot and try again.
phrase.translation: 无法获得DIB锁，请确保没有其他程序访问扫描仪，如果问题仍然存在，重新启动并再试一次。

phrase.original: Temporary file access error. This can be caused when running on a system with limited access rights. Please enable admin rights and try again.
phrase.translation: 临时文件访问错误。这可能是因为用户的访问权限引起的。请启用管理员权限，然后再试一次。

phrase.original: Scan canceled at the user's request.
The scanner returned an error code that wasn't specified in the EZTW32.dll documentation (Error #%1). Please visit http://www.eztwain.com for more information.
phrase.translation: 扫描仪返回一个错误代码，不在eztw32.dll文件规定（错误号 # % 1）。更多信息请访问http://www.eztwain.com。

phrase.original: JPEG XL (JXL) is a modern replacement for the JPEG image format. PhotoDemon does not natively support JPEG XL images, but it can download a free, open-source plugin that adds JPEG XL support.
phrase.translation: JPEG XL(JXL)是JPEG图像格式的升级版本。 PhotoDemon 本身不支持JPEG XL图像，但它可以下载一个免费的开源插件来添加JPEG XL支持。

phrase.original: The libjxl library provides free, open-source JPEG XL compatibility. A portable copy of libjxl will require ~%1 mb of disk space. Once downloaded, PhotoDemon can use libjxl to load and save JPEG XL images (including animations).
phrase.translation: libjxl 库提供免费的开源JPEG XL兼容性。 libjxl的可移植副本将需要 ~%1 mb 的磁盘空间。下载后，PhotoDemon 可以使用libjxl库加载和保存JPEG XL图像（包括动画）。

phrase.original: Would you like PhotoDemon to download libjxl to your PhotoDemon plugin folder?
phrase.translation: 您是否希望PhotoDemon将libjxl库下载到您的PhotoDemon插件文件夹？

phrase.original: PhotoDemon will not download libjxl at this time.

A necessary third-party library (%1) is missing or disabled.
To enable this feature, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon or restore the missing library.
phrase.translation:
缺少或禁用了必要的第三方库（%1）。
要启用此功能，请重新下载PhotoDemon或恢复丢失的库。

phrase.original: Image successfully sent to Windows Photo Printer.
phrase.translation: 图片成功发送到Windows照片打印机。

phrase.original:
Unknown processor request submitted: %1
Please report this bug via the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
提交未知处理器请求：1％
报告bug，请通过帮助菜单->提交错误报告。

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) by shutting down unneeded programs - especially your web browser, if it is open - then try the action again.
phrase.translation: 没有足够的可用内存来继续此操作。请通过关闭不需要的程序释放系统内存，（例如，关闭您打开的浏览器） - 然后再次尝试此操作。

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon cannot locate additional information for this error. That probably means this error is a bug, and it needs to be fixed!
Would you like to submit a bug report? (It takes less than one minute, and it helps everyone who uses the software.)
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon找不到更多信息此错误。这可能意味着这个错误是一个错误，它需要修复！
您想提交错误报告？（只需要一分钟，您可以帮助使用该软件的每个人。）

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has experienced an error. Details on the problem include:
Error number %1 Description: %2
%3
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon出现错误。对这个问题的详细信息包括：
错误号％1 说明：2％
3％

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened the bug report webpage for you. Please click the "New Issue" button, then select "Bug Report". Answer the questions as best you can, and please include the following error number somewhere in your report: %1
When finished, click the Submit New Issue button. Thank you!
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon已自动为您打开错误报告网页。 请单击“新建问题”按钮，然后选择“错误报告”。 尽可能回答问题，并在报告中的某处包含以下错误编号：%1
完成后，单击“提交新问题”按钮。 谢谢！

phrase.original:
An error occurred when attempting to save this image. The FreeImage plugin reported the following error details:
%1
In the meantime, please try saving the image to an alternate format. You can also let the PhotoDemon developers know about this via the Help > Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
试图保存该图像时发生错误。该插件FreeImage的报告了以下错误信息：
1％
在此期间，请尽量将图像保存到一个备用格式。您也可以通过帮助->提交错误报告，让PhotoDemon开发者知道此问题。

phrase.original: Output format not recognized. Save aborted. Please use the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu item to report this incident.
phrase.translation: 输出格式无法识别。保存失败。请使用帮助菜单->提交错误报告，报告这一问题。

phrase.original: This is a still image (only one frame of animation).
phrase.translation: 这是一个静态图像（只有一帧动画）。

phrase.original: You may proceed, but the image will be saved as a static image, not an animated one.
phrase.translation: 您可以继续，但图像将保存为静态图像，而不是动画图像。

phrase.original: Could not retrieve program window - the program appears to have been unloaded.
phrase.translation: 无法检索程序窗口 - 该程序似乎已经被卸载。

phrase.original: This action requires an active selection. Please create a selection before continuing.
phrase.translation: 此操作需要一个活动的选择。继续之前，请创建一个选择。

phrase.original: An error occurred while attempting to load %1. Please verify that the file is a valid PhotoDemon selection file.
phrase.translation: 打开%1时发生错误。请验证该文件是否是有效PhotoDemon文件。

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Selection was not saved. Please try again.
phrase.translation: 未知错误，选区没有保存，请重试。

phrase.original: Release the mouse button to complete the lasso selection
phrase.translation: 松开鼠标按钮来完成套索选择

phrase.original: Click on the first point to complete the polygon selection
phrase.translation: 点击第一个点完成多边形选择

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a value between %2 and %3.
phrase.translation: %1不是一个有效的值。 请输入%2~%3之间的值。

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a numeric value.
phrase.translation: %1 值无效，请输入一个数字。

phrase.original: Ctrl+click to move the active layer here
phrase.translation: 按住Ctrl键并单击可将活动层移到此处

phrase.original: Shift key: preserve layer aspect ratio
Update check postponed (a check has been performed recently)
phrase.translation: 更新检查推迟（最近已进行的检查）

phrase.original: Initializing software updater (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
phrase.translation: 启动时检测软件更新（此功能可以从工具菜单-->选项禁用）

phrase.original: This action relies on a third-party plugin (%1). An updated version of this plugin is available.
phrase.translation: 此操作依赖于第三方插件（%1）。此插件的更新版本可用。

phrase.original: Would you like PhotoDemon to update this plugin for you?
phrase.translation: 你想让PhotoDevon为你更新这个插件吗？

phrase.original: You have placed PhotoDemon in a restricted system folder. Because PhotoDemon does not have administrator access, it cannot download files for you. Please move PhotoDemon to an unrestricted folder and try again.
phrase.translation: 您已将PhotoDemon放置在受限系统文件夹中。因为PhotoDemon没有管理员权限，所以无法为您下载文件。请将PhotoDemon移动到不受限制的文件夹，然后重试。
在1x和重复预览之间切换

phrase.original: Previously saved presets can be selected here. You can save the current settings as a new preset by clicking the Save Preset button on the right.
phrase.translation: 以前保存的预设可以在这里选择。您可以通过单击“保存预设右边的按钮，保存当前设置为一个新的预设。

phrase.original: Randomly select new settings for this tool. This is helpful for exploring how different settings affect the image.
phrase.translation: 随机选择该工具的新的设置。这有助于探索不同的设置会如何影响图像。

phrase.original: Reset all settings to their default values.
phrase.translation: 重置所有设置为默认值。

phrase.original: Save the current settings as a new preset.
phrase.translation: 保存当前设置为新的预置。

phrase.original: Toolbox panels close automatically, but you can pin one to keep it open. (Pinned panels still close when switching tools or opening new panels.)
phrase.translation: 工具箱面板会自动关闭，但您可以固定其中一个以保持其打开。（切换工具或打开新面板时，固定面板仍处于关闭状态。）

phrase.original: Generate a new random number seed.
phrase.translation: 生成一个新的随机数种子。

phrase.original: This image does not contain any GPS metadata.
phrase.translation: 此图像不包含任何GPS数据。

phrase.original: Attempting to connect to the Internet
PhotoDemon cannot reach the Internet. Please double-check your connection and try again.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法访问互联网。请仔细检查您的连接，然后重试。

phrase.original: Verifying URL (this may take a moment)
phrase.translation: 正在验证URL（可能需要一些时间）

phrase.original: PhotoDemon could not reach the target URL (%1). If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法访问目标URL (%1)。如果问题仍然存在，请尝试使用浏览器手动下载该文件。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon lost Internet access. Please double-check your connection.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法访问互联网。请仔细检查您的电脑互联网连接是否正常。
正在下载... (%1 of %2 字节)
下载完毕。验证文件完整性
取消下载(远程服务器拒绝操作)

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, %1 prevented PhotoDemon from directly downloading this file. (Direct downloads are sometimes mistaken as hotlinking by misconfigured servers.)
You will need to manually download this file using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation:
不幸的是，%1 阻止PhotoDemon直接下载此文件。（直接下载有时被错误配置的服务器误认为是热链接），
您需要使用浏览器手动下载此文件。

phrase.original: The clipboard is empty or it does not contain a valid picture format. Please copy a valid image onto the clipboard and try again.
phrase.translation: 剪贴板是空的或没有可识别的图片格式。请复制有效图像到剪贴板并再试一次。
剪贴板中的图像导入成功

phrase.original: Image URL found. Attempting to download
phrase.translation: 找到图片网址。尝试下载

phrase.original: Image download failed. Please copy a valid image URL and try again.
phrase.translation: 图片下载失败。请复制一个有效的图像的网址，并再次尝试。

phrase.original: Memory usage looks high; suspending some data to disk before continuing
phrase.translation: 内存使用率过高；在继续操作之前，先将部分数据暂存到磁盘

phrase.original: ExifTool plugin missing. Metadata import abandoned.
phrase.translation: ExifTool插件缺失。元数据导入放弃。

phrase.original: Removing metadata with potential privacy concerns
phrase.translation: 因为潜在的隐私问题，删除元数据

phrase.original: Unfortunately, the number of images you selected exceeds what Windows allows for a single load operation. Please try again with a smaller set of images.
phrase.translation: 选择的图像数量超出Windows允许的最大数，请重新选择。

phrase.original: This file is password-protected. Please enter a password

phrase.translation: 显示最近的图像，如果有的话

phrase.original: Mouse Wheel = VERTICAL SCROLL, Shift + Wheel = HORIZONTAL SCROLL, Ctrl + Wheel = ZOOM
phrase.translation: 鼠标滚轮=垂直滚动，Shift键+滚轮=水平滚动，按Ctrl+滚轮=放大

phrase.original: Action canceled: target layer isn't visible.
phrase.translation: 动作已取消：目标图层不可见。
关闭全部，仅保留当前图像

phrase.original: Click to enter a full color selection screen.
phrase.translation: 点击进入全彩色选择屏幕。

phrase.original: Click to make the main screen's paint color the active color.
phrase.translation: 点击使主屏的绘画颜色成为当前颜色。

phrase.original: This button will open a new issue page in your web browser. You will need a GitHub account to proceed.
phrase.translation: 这个按钮将在您的网页浏览器中打开一个新的issue页面。您将需要一个GitHub账户来继续操作。

phrase.original: Once this image has been saved to disk, its filename will appear here.
phrase.translation: 将图像保存到磁盘后，文件名将显示在这里。

phrase.original: This image does not have a filename.
Hover an image thumbnail to see its name and current file location.
phrase.translation: 鼠标在图像缩略图悬停，可查看文件名称和位置。

phrase.original: copy all relevant metadata to the new file
phrase.translation: 所有相关的元数据复制到新的文件

phrase.original: erase tags that might be personal (including GPS and location)
phrase.translation: 清除可能是个人的标签（包括全球定位系统和位置）

phrase.original: The final width and height measurements must be between 1 and %1 pixels.
phrase.translation: 最终的宽度和高度必须在1和%1像素之间。

phrase.original: Preserve aspect ratio (sometimes called Constrain Proportions). Use this option to resize an image while keeping the width and height in sync.
phrase.translation: 保持长宽比例。使用此选项来调整图像的大小，同时保持同步的宽度和高度。

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used to resize the image.
phrase.translation: 更改测量用来调整图像大小的单位。

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used for image resolution (pixel density).
phrase.translation: 改变用于图像分辨率（像素密度）的测量单位。

phrase.original: exact aspect ratio will vary by image
phrase.translation: 具体长宽比例会因图像而异

phrase.original: exact size will vary by image
phrase.translation: 具体尺寸会因图像而异

phrase.original: "%1" produces an out of range result (%2). The final value must be between %3 and %4.
phrase.translation: "%1" 超出范围 (%2). 最终值必须在 %3 和 %4 之间。
PhotoDemon 不能解释这个表达式：%1

phrase.original: Change the image size unit displayed to the left of this box
phrase.translation: 更改此框左侧显示的图像大小单位

phrase.original: Select which scanner or camera to use
phrase.translation: 选择要使用的扫描仪或照相机
使用内容识别调整尺寸
当前图层转换为独立图像
所有图层转换为独立的图像

phrase.original: Other open images into this image (as layers)
phrase.translation: 以图层方式打开其它图像到此图像

phrase.original: View debug log for this session
phrase.translation: 查看此会话的调试日志

phrase.original: Show when multiple images are loaded
Support us with a one-time donation
PhotoDemon license and terms of use
phrase.translation: 阅读许可证和使用条款

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. The update is automatically processing in the background
phrase.translation: 发现PhotoDemon新版本，自动在后台进行升级。

phrase.original:
A new version of PhotoDemon is available!
The update is automatically processing in the background. You will receive a new notification when it completes.
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon 新版本可用！
此更新将在后台自动进行。它完成时，您将收到新的通知。

phrase.original: This copy of PhotoDemon is up to date.

This copy of PhotoDemon is the newest version available.
(Current version: %1.%2.%3)
phrase.translation: 当前 PhotodeMon 是最新的版本,无须更新。 （当前版本：%1.%2.%3）

phrase.original: Please wait while the new language is applied
phrase.translation: 请稍候，正在切换新的语言

phrase.original: sample image for true contrast (slower but more accurate)
phrase.translation: 使用真实对比度进行图像采样（速度较慢，但更准确）。

phrase.original: Converting image to black and white
Adjusting hue, saturation, and luminance values
phrase.translation: 调节色调、饱和度和亮度

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid 3D lookup table (LUT).
Your LUT collection is stored in the "%1" folder
phrase.translation: 您的LUT调色预置存储在 "%1"文件夹中

phrase.original: click to open this folder in Windows Explorer
phrase.translation: 单击在资源管理器中打开此文件夹

phrase.original: color to replace (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: 颜色替换（右键预览选择）

phrase.original: Engaging hipsters to perform sepia conversion
left-click to add new nodes or drag existing nodes
phrase.translation: 左键单击以添加新节点或拖动现有节点

phrase.original: (Note: move the mouse over the histogram to calculate these values)
phrase.translation: （注：在直方图上移动鼠标可计算和查看数值）

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the shadow input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: 激活此按钮，可以在预览窗口中右键选择黑场（黑色阈值）。

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the highlight input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: 激活此按钮，可以在预览窗口中右键选择白场（白色阈值）。

phrase.original: Like all monochrome-to-grayscale tools, this tool will produce a blurry image. You can use the Effects -> Sharpen -> Unsharp Masking tool to fix this. (For best results, use an Unsharp Mask radius at least as large as this radius.)
phrase.translation: 类似所有的单色到灰度工具一样，这个工具也会产生一个模糊的图像。您可以使用特效菜单->锐化->USM锐化工具来解决这个问题。（为了获得最佳效果，请使用至少与此半径一样大的“USM锐化”半径。）
调整阴影、中间调和高亮

phrase.original: Autosave data found. Would you like to restore it?
phrase.translation: 发现上次自动保存的数据。您想恢复它吗？

phrase.original: A previous PhotoDemon session terminated unexpectedly. Would you like to automatically recover the following autosaved images?
phrase.translation: 先前PhotoDemon会话意外终止。您想自动恢复下自动保存的图像？

phrase.original: If you exit now, this autosave data will be lost forever. Are you sure you want to exit?
phrase.translation: 如果现在退出，此自动保存数据将永远丢失。您确定要退出？

phrase.original: Warning: autosave data will be deleted
phrase.translation: 警告：自动保存数据将被删除

phrase.original: enter a name for this preset
phrase.translation: 为此预设输入一个名字

phrase.original: A preset with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
phrase.translation: 此预设名已经存在，您想覆盖它吗？

phrase.original: Please enter a name for this preset.
phrase.translation: 请为这个预设输入一个名称。

phrase.original: A gradient with the name "%1" already exists in your collection. Would you like to overwrite it?
phrase.translation: 您的预置中已存在名为“ %1 ”的渐变。 您想覆盖它吗？

phrase.original: This gradient doesn't have a name. Please give it a name before adding it to your collection.
phrase.translation: 这个渐变没有名称，请在将其添加到预置之前为其命名。

phrase.original: Unfortunately, the gradient file "%1" doesn't appear to be a valid gradient file.
Left-click to add new nodes or edit existing nodes. Right-click a node to remove it.
phrase.translation: 左键单击要添加新节点或编辑现有节点。右键单击一个节点，将其删除。

phrase.original: Your gradient collection is stored in the "%1" folder
phrase.translation: 您的渐变预置存储在“ %1 ”文件夹中

phrase.original: When a gradient contains colors with wildly different luminance values, gamma correction may improve its appearance.
phrase.translation: 当渐变包含具有完全不同的亮度值的颜色时，伽马校正可以改善其外观。

phrase.original: Use this setting to automatically calculate equal positioning for all gradient nodes.
phrase.translation: 使用此设置可自动计算所有渐变节点的相等位置。

phrase.original: I understand the risks of running PhotoDemon in the IDE
phrase.translation: 我明白在IDE中运行photodemon有风险

phrase.original: Do not display this warning again
Waiting for user to specify import options
phrase.translation: 正在等待用户指定导入选项
页面尺寸不一致（第一页为%1）

phrase.original: in the future, automatically apply these settings
phrase.translation: 以后会自动应用这些设置

phrase.original: This image contains more than 16 million colors. Before it can be displayed on your screen, it must be converted to a simpler format. This process is called tone mapping.
phrase.translation: 这张图片包含超过1600万种颜色。在您的屏幕上显示之前，它必须被转换为一个更简单的格式。这个过程称为色相映射。

phrase.original: You can change language and theme settings at any time from the Tools menu.
phrase.translation: 您可以随时在工具菜单更改语言和主题设置。

phrase.original: Additional interface customizations are available in the Window menu.
phrase.translation: 菜单中提供了其他语言选项。

phrase.original: Save the image before closing it
Repeat this action for all unsaved images (%1 in total)
phrase.translation: 应用到所有要保存的图像（共 %1）

phrase.original: Do not save the image (discard all changes)

phrase.translation: 取消关闭,返回并继续编辑

phrase.original:
NOTE: if you click 'Save', PhotoDemon will save this image using its current file name.
If you want to save it with a different file name, please select 'Cancel', then use the File -> Save As menu item.
phrase.translation:
注意：如果您点击“保存”，Photodemon将使用其当前文件名保存该图像。
如果您想用另一个不同的文件名保存，请选择“取消”，然后使用文件菜单->另存为。

phrase.original: Because this image has not been saved before, you will be prompted to provide a file name for it.
phrase.translation: 如果这个图像之前没有保存，系统会提示您为它提供一个文件名。

phrase.original: If you do not save this image, any changes you have made will be permanently lost.
phrase.translation: 如果您不保存该图像，您所做的任何更改都将丢失。

phrase.original: Canceling will return you to the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: 取消关闭并返回 Photodemon 主窗口。

phrase.original: %1 has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
phrase.translation: %1 已改变，选择您想执行的操作。

phrase.original: Repeat this action for both unsaved images
phrase.translation: 应用到所有要保存的图像

phrase.original: in the future, do not notify me of updates
phrase.translation: 在未来，不更新时通知我

phrase.original: Learn more about the new features in %1
phrase.translation: 了解更多有关新功能在 %1

phrase.original: (Sorry, but automatic restarts don't work inside the IDE.)
phrase.translation: （很抱歉，但自动重启不能在 IDE 内部工作。）

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. Restart the program to complete the update process.
phrase.translation: 发现 PhotoDemon 新版本。重新启动程序以完成更新过程。

phrase.original: Restart now to access to the latest version of the program.
phrase.translation: 现在重新启动进入到程序的最新版本。

phrase.original: If you're in the middle of something, feel free to keep working. The update process will automatically complete whenever you next use the program.
phrase.translation: 如果您正在编辑图像,您可以继续工作。更新过程将在您下一次启动本软件时自动完成。
扩展以适应行程(如有必要)

phrase.original: Photoshop (8bf) plugins are files with an "8bf" extension. These plugins provide new image effects. Thousands of 8bf plugins are available online.
phrase.translation: Photoshop（8bf）插件是扩展名为“8bf”的文件。这些插件提供了新的图像效果，网上有数千个8bf插件。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon does not ship with 8bf plugins, but if you find plugins online, you can download them and add them to PhotoDemon. (PhotoDemon supports most 32-bit 8bf plugins. 64-bit plugins are not supported.)
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon不附带8bf插件，但如果您在网上找到需要的插件，您可以下载它们并将其添加到PhotoDemon中。（PhotoDemon支持大多数32位8bf插件，不支持64位插件）

phrase.original: After downloading one or more 8bf files, use the settings button (above) to tell PhotoDemon where to find them. PhotoDemon will then add them to your Effects collection.
phrase.translation: 下载一个或多个8bf文件后，使用设置按钮（上图）告诉PhotoDemon在哪里可以找到它们，PhotoDemon会将它们添加到您的预置特效中。

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the image
phrase.translation: 如果像素位于图像之外
应用黑白怀旧胶片效果到图像
应用玻璃砖效果到图像

phrase.original: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window
phrase.translation: 您还可以通过单击预览窗口设置中心位置

phrase.original: Peering at image through imaginary kaleidoscope
phrase.translation: 应用万花筒效果到图像
应用现代艺术效果到图像
应用透明薄膜效果到图像
应用彩绘玻璃效果到图像

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the corrected area
phrase.translation: 如果像素位于校正区域之外
应用甜甜圈效果到图像
应用画中画效果到图像
应用挤压和旋转到图像

phrase.original: Dipping image in virtual wave pool

phrase.translation: 正在处理%3过滤器，应用%2 通过%1

phrase.original: Tracing image edges with virtual paintbrush

phrase.translation: 正在计算图像梯度边缘

phrase.original: Searching each pixel range for edges
phrase.translation: 正在根据像素范围进行边缘检测
应用紫外线光照到到图像
应用十字星光效果到图像

phrase.original: Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow

phrase.translation: 应用胶片颗粒效果到图像
应用调和均值滤波到图像
应用均值偏移滤波到图像
应用腐蚀（最低等级）过滤器
应用膨胀（最高等级）过滤器

phrase.original: Printing image to digital halftone surface
phrase.translation: 应用数字半色调到图像
应用铜版雕刻效果到图像
应用马赛克效果到图像
应用点状化效果到图像
应用漫反射效果到图像
使用调色板的透明度值
将新调色板应用于图像

phrase.original: Applying petroleum jelly to camera lens
phrase.translation: 应用发光肖像效果到图像

phrase.original: Applying pan and zoom (Ken Burns) effect
phrase.translation: 应用平移和缩放（Ken Burns）效果到图像
向前（轮廓定义目标区域）

phrase.original: If you want to enlarge the canvas to fit the rotated image, please use the Image -> Rotate menu instead.
phrase.translation: 如果您想扩大画布以适应旋转的图像，请使用图像菜单->旋转。

phrase.original: click OK to begin the repair operation
phrase.translation: 点击确定开始修复操作
目标文件夹（仅适用于修复的文件）

phrase.original: attempt to repair video and audio files
overwrite matching filenames in the destination folder
phrase.translation: 覆盖目标文件夹中的同名文件

phrase.original: after a successful recovery, erase the original (unrepaired) file
phrase.translation: 修复成功后，删除原始(未修复)文件

phrase.original: generating list of files to repair

phrase.translation: 正在修复文件 %1 / %2 (%3 执行修复)
修复完成，修复 %1 个文件。

phrase.original:
%1 files(s) repaired.
Repaired files have been saved to the destination folder. Unrepaired files remain in their original locations.
phrase.translation:
%1 个文件修复成功。
已修复的文件已保存到目标文件夹中，未修复的文件保留在其原始位置。

phrase.original: The source folder does not contain any files. Please try another folder.
phrase.translation: 源文件夹不包含任何文件，请换另一个文件夹试试。

phrase.original: Step 1: select the photo editing action(s) to apply to each image
phrase.translation: 第一步：选择适用于每个图像的编辑操作

phrase.original: set export settings for this format
phrase.translation: 设置此格式的导出设置

phrase.original: keep images in their original format
convert all images to a new format
phrase.translation: 所有的图像转换为新的格式

phrase.original: set export settings for animated images
phrase.translation: 设置动画图像的导出参数

phrase.original: if you only want to rename images or change image formats, use this option
phrase.translation: 如果您只是想重命名或改变图像格式，请使用此选项。

phrase.original: apply other actions from a saved macro file
phrase.translation: 从保存的宏文件中应用其他操作
修正曝光和光照的问题

phrase.original: remove all images in this folder
phrase.translation: 删除此文件夹中的所有图像

phrase.original: (batch conversion process will appear here at run-time)
phrase.translation: （批量转换过程中运行时会出现在这里）

phrase.original: add a prefix to each filename
phrase.translation: 为每个文件名添加一个前缀

phrase.original: add a suffix to each filename
phrase.translation: 为每个文件名添加后缀

phrase.original: remove the following text (if found) from each filename
phrase.translation: 从每个文件名中删除以下文本（如果有的话）

phrase.original: force each filename, including extension, to the following case
phrase.translation: 强制每个文件名（包括扩展名）如下

phrase.original: replace spaces in filenames with underscores
phrase.translation: 用下划线替换文件名中的空格

phrase.original: after images are processed, save them with the following name
phrase.translation: 图像处理后，用以下名称保存
输出图像到这个文件夹

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel the current batch process?
phrase.translation: 您确定想取消当前批处理？

phrase.original:
If you exit now, your batch list (the list of images to be processed) will be lost. By saving your list, you can easily resume this batch operation at a later date.
Would you like to save your batch list before exiting?
phrase.translation:
如果您现在退出，您批次列表（图像批处理列表）将丢失。保存您的列表可以很容易地在以后恢复这些操作。
您要在退出前保存您的批次列表吗？

phrase.original: You have already created a list of images for processing. The list of images inside this file will be appended to the bottom of your current list.
phrase.translation: 您已经创建了一个图像处理列表，这个文件的图像列表将被附加到当前列表的底部。

phrase.original: This is not a valid list of images. Please try a different file.
phrase.translation: 这不是有效的图像列表，请尝试一个不同的文件。

phrase.original: You have requested that a macro be applied to each image, but no macro file has been selected. Please select a valid macro file.
phrase.translation: 您已经要求宏被应用到每个图像，但没有宏文件已被选定。请选择一个有效的宏文件。

phrase.original: You have not selected any images to process! Please add one or more images to the batch list.
phrase.translation: 您没有选择任何图像处理！请将一个或多个图像添加到批处理列表中。

phrase.original: Before proceeding, you need to click the "set export settings for this format" button to specify what export settings you want to use.
phrase.translation: 在继续执行之前，您需要单击“设置此格式的导出设置”按钮以指定要使用的导出设置。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon cannot access the requested output folder. Please select a non-system, unrestricted folder for the batch process.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon不能访问所请求的输出文件夹。请选择一个非系统的，没有权限限制的文件夹进行批处理。

phrase.original: Welcome to PhotoDemon's batch wizard. This tool can be used to edit multiple images at once, in what is called a "batch process".
phrase.translation: 欢迎 PhotoDemon 批处理向导。这个工具可以用来同时编辑多个图像，这就是所谓的“批处理”。

phrase.original: Start by selecting the photo editing action(s) you want to apply. If multiple actions are selected, they will be applied in the order they appear on this page.
phrase.translation: 首先选择要应用的图片。如果有多个动作被选择，将会按顺序来处理。

phrase.original: Note: a "macro" is simply a list of photo editing actions. It can include any adjustment, filter, or effect in the main program. You can create a new macro by using the "Tools -> Macros -> Record new macro" menu in the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: 注：“宏”是一个简单的照片编辑动作列表。它可以包括任何调整，滤波效果，或在主程序。您可以通过工具菜单->宏->录制新宏，创建一个新的宏。

phrase.original: In the next step, you will select the images you want to process.
phrase.translation: 在接下来的步骤中，您将选择您要处理的图片。

phrase.original: Step 2: prepare the batch list (the list of images to be processed)
phrase.translation: 第二步：准备批处理图像列表。

phrase.original: You can add files to the batch list in two ways
phrase.translation: 您可以通过两种方式将文件添加到列表

phrase.original: 1) By manually adding one or more image file(s) using a standard Open Image dialog.
phrase.translation: 1）通过图像对话框手动添加一个或多个图像文件。

phrase.original: 2) By adding entire folders at once. Image file(s) inside the folder (or subfolders, if selected) will be automatically identified.
In the next step, you will choose how you want the processed images saved.
phrase.translation: 在接下来的步骤中，您将选择您要如何处理后的图像保存。

phrase.original: Step 3: choose a destination image format
phrase.translation: 第三步：选择目标图像格式。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon needs to know which format to use when saving the images in your batch list.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon需要知道保存图像批处理列表中时使用的格式。

phrase.original: If "keep images in their original format" is selected, PhotoDemon will attempt to save each image in its original format. If the original format is not supported, a standard format (JPEG or PNG, depending on color depth) will be used.
phrase.translation: 如果“保持图像的原始格式”被选中，PhotoDemon将尝试保存每个图像的原始格式。如果不支持原始格式，则使用标准格式（JPEG或PNG，根据颜色深度）。

phrase.original: If you choose to save images to a new format, please make sure the format you have selected is appropriate for all images in your list. (For example, images with transparency should be saved to a format that supports transparency!)
phrase.translation: 如果您选择将图像保存到一个新的格式，请确保您所选择的格式适用于列表中的所有图像。（例如，具有透明度的图像应保存为支持透明度的图像格式！）

phrase.original: In the final step, you will choose how you want the saved files to be named.
phrase.translation: 在最后一步，选择您想要保存的文件命名方式。

phrase.original: Step 4: provide a destination folder and any renaming options
phrase.translation: 第四步：提供一个目标文件夹和重命名选项。

phrase.original: In this final step, PhotoDemon needs to know where to save the processed images, and what name to give the new files.
phrase.translation: 在这最后一步，PhotoDemon需要知道在哪里保存处理过的图像，以及什么样的名字给新文件。

phrase.original: For your convenience, a number of standard renaming options are also provided. Note that all items under "additional rename options" are optional.
phrase.translation: 为了您的方便，还提供了一些标准的重命名选项。请注意，在“其他选项重命名选项”的所有项目都是可选的。

phrase.original: Finally, if two or more images in the batch list have the same filename, and the "original filenames" option is selected, such files will automatically be given unique filenames upon saving (e.g. "original-filename (2)").
phrase.translation: 最后，如果该批次列表中两个或更多图像具有相同的文件名，并选择了“原始文件名”选项，这些文件将在自动保存时通过添加数字指定唯一文件名（例如，“原始文件名（2）”）。

phrase.original: Step 5: wait for batch processing to finish
Once the batch processor has processed several images, it will display an estimated time remaining.
phrase.translation: 批量处理器处理多幅图像时，它会显示一个估计的剩余时间。

phrase.original: You can cancel batch processing at any time by pressing the "Cancel" button in the bottom-right corner. If you choose to cancel, any processed images will still be present in the output folder, so you may need to remove them manually.
phrase.translation: 您可以在任何时候在右下角按“取消”按钮来取消批处理。如果您选择取消，之前处理的图像依旧会出现在输出文件夹，所以您可能需要手动删除它们。

phrase.original: Save the current list of images
You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more files to the batch list before saving.
phrase.translation: 您还没有选择任何图像文件。请在保存前添加一个或多个文件到批处理列表。

phrase.original: if PhotoDemon does not support an image's original format, a standard format will be used
phrase.translation: 如果PhotoDemon不支持图像的原始格式，将使用标准格式

phrase.original: ( specifically, JPEG at 92% quality for photographs, and lossless PNG for non-photographs )
phrase.translation: （具体地，照片使用JPEG 92％质量因数，非照片使用无损PNG）

phrase.original: Batch conversion canceled. %1 image(s) were processed before cancelation. Last processed image was "%2".
phrase.translation: 批量转换已取消。在取消之前处理了%1个图像，最后处理的图像是"%2"。

phrase.original: Waiting for user to specify export options
phrase.translation: 等待用户指定导出选项

phrase.original: This button only affects the preview above. The repeat setting on the right is what will be used by the exported image file.
phrase.translation: 此按钮仅影响上面的预览。右侧的重复设置是导出的图像文件将使用的设置。

phrase.original: frame time for undefined layers (in ms)
phrase.translation: 未定义图层的帧时间（毫秒）

phrase.original: Adobe Swatch Exchange (ASE) files can store multiple palettes inside a single file. If you select the "append" option, PhotoDemon will add this palette to your existing ASE file. Any palettes already inside the file will not be modified.
phrase.translation: Adobe Swatch Exchange（ASE）文件可以在单个文件中存储多个调色板。 如果选择“追加”选项，PhotoDemon会将此调色板添加到现有的ASE文件中。 不会修改文件中已有的任何调色板。

phrase.original: full download path (must begin with "http://" or "ftp://")
phrase.translation: 完整的下载路径（必须以“http：//”或“FTP：//”）

phrase.original: This URL is not valid. Please make sure the URL begins with "http://" or "ftp://".
phrase.translation: 输入的网址无效，请输入一个正确地址，并以"http://" 或 "ftp://" 开头

phrase.original: Please be respectful of copyrights when downloading images. Thanks!
phrase.translation: 下载图片时请尊重版权，谢谢！

phrase.original: currently available programs (listed by window title)
phrase.translation: 目前可用的程序（按窗口标题列出）

phrase.original: Please select a window to capture.
This program is currently minimized. Restore it to normal size for best results.
phrase.translation: 这个程序是目前最小化。将其还原为正常大小以获得最佳结果。

phrase.original: Some programs (including Windows Store apps) do not allow direct screen captures. If an application preview appears as a black square, you will need to take a full desktop screenshot, then manually crop the desired window region.
phrase.translation: 有些程序（包括 Windows 应用商店程序）不允许直接截取窗口，如果一个应用程序预览显示为黑色，您需要截取一个完整的桌面截图，然后手动裁剪所需的窗口区域。

phrase.original: Image printed successfully. (Note: depending on your printer, additional print confirmation screens may appear.)
phrase.translation: 图像打印成功。（注意：根据您的打印机驱动情况，可能会显示附加的打印确认信息。）

phrase.original: %1 was unable to print the image. Please make sure that the specified printer (%2) is powered-on and ready for printing.
phrase.translation: %1无法打印图像。请确保指定的打印机（%2）已准备就绪。

phrase.original: This image format is very computationally intensive. On older or slower PCs, you may want to disable live previews.
phrase.translation: 压缩计算很耗时，在较旧或较慢的PC上，您可能希望禁用实时预览。
透明颜色（右键选择图像）

phrase.original: treat each layer as a unique icon frame
phrase.translation: 将每一层视为唯一的图标帧
适度压缩，中等图像质量（%1）

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (%1)
phrase.translation: 极致压缩，图像质量很差（%1）

phrase.original: change file extension to match color model
phrase.translation: 改变文件扩展名来匹配颜色模型

phrase.original: PNG files support different compression strategies (called "filters"). Smart filter selection produces better compression. Use the automatic setting to have PhotoDemon test multiple strategies, and automatically select the one that produces the best compression.
phrase.translation: PNG文件支持不同的压缩策略（称为“过滤器”）。智能滤波器选择产生更好的压缩 使用自动设置让PhotoDemon测试多种策略，并自动选择产生最佳压缩的策略。

phrase.original: the fast, free, portable photo editor
phrase.translation: 快速，免费的，便携式照片编辑器

phrase.original: Participate in development, design, or translation work
phrase.translation: 参与开发、设计或翻译工作
审查程序和插件许可证

phrase.original: PhotoDemon is Copyright %1 2000-%2 by Tanner Helland and Contributors
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon Copyright %1 2000-%2 版权属于Tanner Helland和贡献者

phrase.original: Thank you to our wonderful Patreon supporters!
phrase.translation: 感谢我们精彩的Patreon支持者！

phrase.original: (You can become a patron, too! Click here to learn more.)
phrase.translation: （您也可以成为赞助人！点击此处了解更多信息。）
根据需要调整图像大小
使用Lab颜色空间进行比较

phrase.original: generate difference map as a new layer
phrase.translation: 生成差异图作为新图层

phrase.original: Peak signal-to-noise ratio (PSNR) between these images
phrase.translation: 这些图像之间的峰值信噪比（PSNR）

phrase.original: As a rough estimate, these images are %1% similar.
phrase.translation: 据估算，这些图像相似度为%1%

phrase.original: Note: this operation will flatten the image before resizing it.
phrase.translation: 注意：在调整图像大小之前将合并图像。
初始化内容识别调整引擎
使用内容识别调整尺寸

phrase.original: add this to the "Adjustments > Color > Color lookup" tool
phrase.translation: 将此添加到“调整>色彩>颜色查找”工具
生成完整的元数据报告（HTML）

phrase.original: Remove tags that might contain personal information
phrase.translation: 删除可能包含个人信息的标签
此图像中有%1个元数据分组

phrase.original: Copy this tag to the clipboard
phrase.translation: 将此标签复制到剪贴板

phrase.original: Reset tag to its original value
Mark this entire group for removal
Copy all tags in this group to the clipboard
phrase.translation: 将此组中的所有标签复制到剪贴板

phrase.original: Reset entire group to its original values
phrase.translation: 重置整个组为其原始值

phrase.original: Metadata support is provided by the open-source ExifTool library.
phrase.translation: 元数据支持由开源ExifTool库提供。
在这个类别中有1个标签
在这个类别中没有标签

phrase.original: "System" tags are provided by the operating system. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “系统”标签由操作系统提供。它们不被嵌入到传统元数据中。

phrase.original: "File" tags are required by this image format. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “文件”标签是由该图像格式要求。它们不被嵌入到传统元数据中。

phrase.original: ICC profiles are handled automatically by PhotoDemon. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: ICC配置文件是由PhotoDemon自动处理。它们不被嵌入到传统元数据中。

phrase.original: "Inferred" tags are hypothetical values inferred from other metadata. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “推断”标签是从其他元数据中推断出来的假设值。它们不被嵌入到传统元数据中。

phrase.original: This is a protected tag. Edits are allowed, but they may be overwritten to produce a valid image file.
phrase.translation: 这是一个受保护标签。虽然允许编辑，但他们可能会被重写以生成有效的图像文件。。

phrase.original: This tag is restricted. It cannot be edited, and removal requests will be ignored if they result in an invalid file.
phrase.translation: 这个标签被限制。它不能被编辑，如果它们导致文件无效，则将被忽略。

phrase.original: list of %1, one entry per line
when changing aspect ratio, fit image to new size by
phrase.translation: 改变长宽比时，适应新的图像大小

phrase.original: fitting inclusively, with transparent borders as necessary
phrase.translation: 缩放到新尺寸，根据需要保持边缘透明

phrase.original: fitting exclusively, and cropping as necessary
phrase.translation: 缩放到新尺寸，根据需要裁剪多余部分

phrase.original: Some image resampling filters support approximate calculations. These improve performance at a minor penalty to quality.
phrase.translation: 一些图像重采样过滤器支持近似计算，这可以改进性能，同时对质量的影响很小。

phrase.original: Resampling affects the quality of a resized image. For a good summary of resampling techniques, visit the Image Resampling article on Wikipedia.
phrase.translation: 重采样的大小对图像质量有影响，请参考相关资料获取更多信息。

phrase.original: When changing an image's aspect ratio, undesirable stretching may occur. PhotoDemon can avoid this by using empty borders or cropping instead.
phrase.translation: 改变图像的纵横比时，可能发生拉伸或缩放变形。PhotoDemon会使用透明边缘或裁剪边缘来进行处理。

phrase.original: make the new layer the active layer
if imported layer names match existing layer names
phrase.translation: 如果导入的图层名称在现有的图层名称中已经存在
调整大小以适应导入的图层

phrase.original: replace existing layers with imported ones
phrase.translation: 用导入图层的替换现有的图层
将同名的图层添加为新图层

phrase.original: close images normally (prompt for unsaved changes)
phrase.translation: 正常关闭图像（提示未保存的更改）

phrase.original: color to erase (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: 颜色擦除（右键单击预览选择）

phrase.original: Adding new alpha channel to image

phrase.translation: 单击：显示“新建图层”对话框

phrase.original: Shift + Click: add a blank layer
phrase.translation: 按住Shift键并单击：添加空白图层

phrase.original: Click: move this layer up the layer stack
phrase.translation: 单击：将此层向上移动到图层顶部

phrase.original: Shift + Click: merge this layer with the layer above it
phrase.translation: 按住Shift键并单击：将此层与其上方的图层合并

phrase.original: Click: move this layer down the layer stack
Shift + Click: merge this layer with the layer beneath it
phrase.translation: 按住Shift键并单击：将此层与其下方的图层合并

phrase.original: Click: add a duplicate of this layer
phrase.translation: 单击：添加此图层的副本

phrase.original: File tools: create, load, and save image files
phrase.translation: 文件工具：创建、加载和保存图像文件

phrase.original: Undo/Redo tools: revert changes made to an image or layer
phrase.translation: 撤消/重做工具：恢复对图像或图层所做的更改

phrase.original: Layout tools: explore, zoom, move or measure an image or layer
phrase.translation: 布局工具：浏览、缩放、移动或测量图像或图层

phrase.original: Select tools: isolate parts of an image or layer for further editing
phrase.translation: 选择工具：将图像或图层中的部分隔离，以进行进一步的编辑

phrase.original: Text tools: create and edit text layers
phrase.translation: 文本工具：创建和编辑文本图层

phrase.original: Paint tools: use a mouse, touchpad, or pen tablet to apply brushstrokes to an image or layer
phrase.translation: 画图工具：使用鼠标，触控板，或手写板来操作图像或图层

phrase.original: This option will create a blank image. Other ways to create new images can be found in the File -> Import menu.
phrase.translation: 此选项将创建一个空白图像。也可以在文件菜单->导入，创建新图像（快捷键：Ctrl+N）。

phrase.original: Another way to open images is dragging them from your desktop or Windows Explorer and dropping them onto PhotoDemon.
phrase.translation: 您可以从桌面或Windows资源管理器中拖拽图片文件到PhotoDemon上。

phrase.original: Open one or more images for editing
phrase.translation: 打开一个或多个图像进行编辑。

phrase.original: If the current image has not been saved, you will receive a prompt to save it before it closes.
phrase.translation: 如果当前图像没有被保存，关闭之前您将收到一个保存提示。

phrase.original: Because you have turned off save prompts (via Edit -> Preferences), you WILL NOT receive a prompt to save this image before it closes.
phrase.translation: 因为您已经关闭保存提示（通过工具菜单->选项），所以在关闭此图像之前，您将不会收到保存此图像的提示。

phrase.original: WARNING: this will overwrite the current image file. To save to a different file, use the "Save As" button.
phrase.translation: 警告：这会覆盖当前的图像文件。要保存到不同的文件，使用“另存为”按钮。

phrase.original: You have specified "safe" save mode, which means that each save will create a new file with an auto-incremented filename.
phrase.translation: 您指定的“安全”的保存方式，这意味着每创建一个新文件，文件名自动递增。

phrase.original: Use this to quickly save a lossless copy of the current image. The lossless copy will be saved in PDI format, in the image's current folder, using the current filename (plus an auto-incremented number, as necessary).
phrase.translation: 使用此选项可以快速保存当前图像的无损副本。无损副本将以PDI格式保存在图像的当前文件夹中，使用当前文件名（数字自动递增）。

phrase.original: The Save As command always raises a dialog, so you can specify a new file name, folder, and/or image format for the current image.
phrase.translation: “另存为”命令会弹出一个对话框，可以指定当前图像的新文件名、保存路径、图像格式。

phrase.original: Save As (export to new format or filename)
phrase.translation: 另存为（导出为新的图像格式或其它文件名）
手形工具，点击并拖动图像
移动工具，移动图像和调整图层尺寸
吸管工具，从图像中选择颜色
测量工具，测量角度和距离
魔棒工具，选择相似区域
铅笔工具，绘制硬边缘线条
画笔工具，绘制羽化边缘线条

phrase.original: Lock this value. (Only one value can be locked at a time. If you lock a new value, previously locked values will unlock.)
phrase.translation: 锁定此值。（一次只能锁定一个值，如果锁定新值，先前锁定的值将解锁。）

phrase.original: Allow cropping outside image boundaries (which will enlarge the image).
phrase.translation: 允许在图像边界外进行裁剪（这将放大图像）。

phrase.original: Resolution is used to convert real-world measurements to pixels. It is ignored for measurements already in pixels.
phrase.translation: 分辨率用于将真实世界的测量值转换为像素。对于已经以像素为单位的测量，它将被忽略。

phrase.original: You can use this measurement in landscape or portrait orientation.
phrase.translation: 您可以在横向或纵向方向上使用此测量。

phrase.original: This setting forcibly aligns paint strokes to pixel grid centerpoints. This improves precision (especially at small brush sizes), but brush strokes may appear less natural.
phrase.translation: 此设置强制将绘制笔划与像素网格中心点对齐。这提高了精度（特别是在小画笔尺寸下），但画笔笔划可能看起来不那么自然。

phrase.original: Fills support many different styles. Click to switch between solid color, pattern, and gradient styles.
phrase.translation: 填充支持许多不同的风格。单击可在纯色、图案和渐变样式之间切换。

phrase.original: Tolerance controls how similar two pixels must be before spreading the fill between them.
phrase.translation: 容差控制两个像素之间的相似程度，然后在它们之间进行填充。

phrase.original: Normally, fill operations analyze the entire image. You can also analyze just the active layer.
phrase.translation: 通常情况下，填充操作分析整个图像，您也可以仅分析活动层。

phrase.original: Normally, fills spread out from a target pixel, adding neighboring pixels as it goes. You can alternatively set it to analyze the entire image, without regard for continuity.
phrase.translation: 通常，填充从目标像素展开，并在进行时添加相邻像素。也可以将其设置为分析整个图像，而不考虑连续性。

phrase.original: This option controls how pixels are analyzed when adding them to the fill.
phrase.translation: 此选项控制添加像素到填充时如何分析像素。

phrase.original: Make current layer transforms (size, angle, and shear) permanent. This action is never required, but if viewport rendering is sluggish, it may improve performance.
phrase.translation: 使当前图层变换（大小、角度、形变）为永久性的。这个操作是不是必需的，但如果窗口渲染缓慢，它可以提高性能。

phrase.original: This option controls how smoothly selection edges blend with their surroundings.
phrase.translation: 该选项控制选择与周围环境如何顺畅混合。

phrase.original: Selections normally select the area inside their boundaries, but you can modify this behavior here. (For advanced selection area adjustments, use the Select menu.)
phrase.translation: 选区通常选择框的内部区域，但您可以在此处修改此行为。（对于高级选择区域调整，请使用“选择”菜单。）

phrase.original: This option adjusts the width of the selection border.
phrase.translation: 此选项调整选区边框的宽度。

phrase.original: This feathering slider allows for immediate feathering adjustments. For performance reasons, it is limited to small radii. For larger feathering radii, use the Select -> Feathering menu.
phrase.translation: 羽化滑块可以立即调整羽化效果。由于性能的原因，它被限制为小半径。对于较大的羽化半径，请使用选择菜单->羽化。

phrase.original: This option adjusts the roundness of a rectangular selection's corners.
phrase.translation: 此选项调整矩形选区的圆角的弧度。

phrase.original: This panel can automatically open when you edit or create a selection. On smaller screens, this may not be helpful if obscures too much of the canvas, so you can disable this behavior here.
phrase.translation: 编辑或创建选择时，此面板会自动打开；在较小的屏幕上，如果遮挡了太多画布，可以在此处禁用此行为。

phrase.original: This option adjusts the curvature, if any, of a polygon selection's sides.
phrase.translation: 此选项可调整多边形选择线的曲率。

phrase.original: This option increases the smoothness of a hand-drawn lasso selection.
phrase.translation: 此选项提升套索选择的平滑度。

phrase.original: Tolerance controls how similar a pixel must be to the target color before it is added to a magic wand selection.
phrase.translation: 容差控制像素在魔杖选择时与目标颜色的相似程度。

phrase.original: The magic wand tool can operate on the entire image, or just the active layer.
phrase.translation: 魔棒可以在整个图像上操作，或者仅仅是在活动层上。

phrase.original: Normally, the magic wand will spread out from the target pixel, adding neighboring pixels to the selection as it goes. Alternatively, you can have it search the entire image, without regards for continuity.
phrase.translation: 通常，魔棒会从目标像素中扩展，在选择的情况下增加相邻像素。可以把它设置为搜索整个图像，而不考虑连续性。

phrase.original: This option controls which criteria the magic wand uses to compare pixels to the target color.
phrase.translation: 此选项控制魔棒将当前像素与目标颜色进行比较的标准，以确定是否应该将此像素添加到当前选择区。

phrase.original: always open this panel for new text layers
phrase.translation: 始终打开此面板以获取新的文本层

phrase.original: This is an advanced text layer. To edit it with the basic text tool, you must first convert it to a basic text layer.
phrase.translation: 这是一个高级文本层。 要使用基本文本工具进行编辑，必须首先将其转换为基本文本层。

phrase.original: Click here to convert this layer to basic text.
phrase.translation: 单击此处将此层转换为基本文本。

phrase.original: This is a basic text layer. To edit it with the advanced text tool, you must first convert it to an advanced text layer.
phrase.translation: 这是基本的文字层。要使用高级文本工具进行编辑，必须首先将其转换为高级文本层。

phrase.original: Click here to convert this layer to advanced text.
phrase.translation: 单击此处将此层转换为高级文本。

phrase.original: One or more hotkeys is currently assigned to multiple actions.
phrase.translation: 一个或多个热键当前分配给多个操作。

phrase.original: If you proceed, PhotoDemon will only keep the first occurrence of any duplicated hotkeys.
phrase.translation: 如果继续，PhotoDemon将只保留任何第一次出现的重复热键。

phrase.original: Press cancel to keep editing hotkeys.
Please use this hotkey on just one action
phrase.translation: 请仅对一个操作使用此热键。

phrase.original: This will overwrite any hotkey edits. Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: 这将覆盖任何热键设定。您确定要继续吗？

phrase.original: click here for detailed instructions (in English)
phrase.translation: 点击这里查看详细说明（英文）

phrase.original: Save this translation and proceed to the next phrase
phrase.translation: 保存并继续翻译下一句
自动翻译所有缺失的词条

phrase.original: (NOTE: CTRL+ENTER automatically saves and proceeds to next phrase.)
phrase.translation: (按下CTRL+ENTER，自动保存并进入下一词条)。

phrase.original: official ISO language codes at Wikipedia
phrase.translation: 维基百科上的ISO官方语言代码

phrase.original: free DeepL.com API key for automatic translation suggestions
phrase.translation: 免费的DeepL.com API密钥用于自动翻译建议

phrase.original: language file (.po) from any other software, as a reference
phrase.translation: 从任何其他软件的语言文件（.po），作为一个参考

phrase.original: official ISO country codes at Wikipedia
phrase.translation: 维基百科上的官方ISO国家代码

phrase.original: These optional settings can accelerate the translation process. They are not saved to the language file.
phrase.translation: 这些可选设置可以加速翻译过程。它们不会被保存到语言文件中。

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to delete %1? (This action cannot be undone.)
phrase.translation: 您确定要删除 %1 吗？ (这个动作不能撤销。)

phrase.original: You do not have access to this folder. Please log in as an administrator and try again.
phrase.translation: 您没有访问此文件夹权限。请以管理员身份登录并再次尝试。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon's en-US language file could not be located on this PC. This file is included with the official release of PhotoDemon, but it may not be included with development or beta builds.
To start a new translation, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
很遗憾，在这台电脑上无法找到 PhotoDemon 的 en-US 语言文件。该文件包含在PhotoDemon的正式版本中，但它可能不包含在开发或测试版中。
您可以从photodemon.org下载PhotoDemon的正式版以获取此文件。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this language file could not be loaded. It's possible the copy on this PC is out-of-date.
To continue, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
这种语言文件无法加载。这有可能在这台电脑上的PhotoDemon软件版本已经过时。
请从PhotoDemon.org下载PhotoDemon的最新版本。

phrase.original: Language file could not be loaded

phrase.translation: 从会话历史记录中创建宏

phrase.original: WARNING: this is not a valid macro. You must include at least one action that modifies the image.
phrase.translation: 警告：这不是一个有效的宏，您必须包括至少一个修改图像的操作。

phrase.original: WARNING: this is not a valid macro. The last action cannot occur after the first action.
phrase.translation: 警告：这不是一个有效的宏。最后一个操作不能在第一个操作之后发生。

phrase.original: Your final macro will contain %1 action(s).
phrase.translation: 您的最终宏将包含%1个操作。

phrase.original:
All settings will be restored to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation:
所有设置都将恢复到默认值。此动作无法撤消。
您确定要继续吗？
已安装，但版本号出现意外
已经安装，但是被用户禁用

phrase.original: This library does not ship with PhotoDemon.
If you interact with %1, PhotoDemon will offer to download and configure this library for you.
phrase.translation: 如果您与 %1 交互，PhotoDemon将为您下载并配置此库。
在PhotoDemon中打开（用于进一步编辑）
重置所有“记住我的选择”的决定

phrase.original: after pasting a new layer, activate the Move tool
The title bar of the main PhotoDemon window displays information about the currently loaded image. Use this preference to control how much information is displayed.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon主窗口的标题栏显示有关当前加载的图像的信息， 使用此首选项可以控制显示的信息量。

phrase.original: To help identify transparent pixels, a special grid appears "behind" them. This setting modifies the grid's appearance.
phrase.translation: 为了帮助识别透明像素，在它们的"后面"会出现一个特殊的网格。此设置可以修改网格的外观。

phrase.original: when images arrive from an external source (like Windows Explorer)
phrase.translation: 当图像来自外部来源（如Windows资源管理器）时。

phrase.original: display tone mapping options when importing HDR and RAW images
phrase.translation: 当导入HDR和原图像时显示色相映射选项

phrase.original: automatically restore sessions interrupted by system updates or reboots
phrase.translation: 自动恢复因系统更新或重新启动而中断的会话

phrase.original: load into a new PhotoDemon instance
HDR and RAW images contain more colors than PC screens can physically display. Before displaying such images, a tone mapping operation must be applied to the original image data.
phrase.translation: HDR和原图像包含比PC屏幕可以显示更多的颜色。在显示这些图像之前，必须将图像映射操作应用于原始图像数据。

phrase.original: If your PC reboots while PhotoDemon is running, PhotoDemon can automatically restore your previous session.
phrase.translation: 如果您的电脑在PhotoDemon运行时重新启动，PhotoDemon可以自动恢复您以前的会话。

phrase.original: when closing images, warn about unsaved changes
phrase.translation: 关闭图像时，警告未保存的更改

phrase.original: when using "Save As", set the default file format to
phrase.translation: 使用“另存为”时，将使用默认文件格式

phrase.original: when using "Save As", set the initial folder to
By default, PhotoDemon will warn you when you attempt to close an image with unsaved changes.
phrase.translation: 默认情况下，当您尝试使用未保存的更改关闭图像时，PhotoDemon将发出警告。

phrase.original: Most photo editors default to the current image's folder. For workflows that involve loading images from one folder but saving to a new folder, use the last-used folder to save time.
phrase.translation: 大多数照片编辑器默认为当前图像的文件夹。如果要从一个文件夹加载图像并保存到新文件夹的批量工作，请使用“最后使用的文件夹”以节省时间。

phrase.original: Most photo editors default to the current image's format. For workflows that involve loading images in one format (e.g. RAW) but saving to a new format (e.g. JPEG), use the last-used format to save time.
phrase.translation: 大多数照片编辑器默认为当前图像的格式。对于涉及以一种格式（如RAW）加载图像但保存为新格式（如JPEG）的批量工作，请使用“最后使用的格式”以节省时间。
改写当前文件（默认行为）

phrase.original: save a new copy, e.g. "filename (2).jpg" (safe behavior)
phrase.translation: 保存一个新的副本，如“文件名（2）.JPG”（安全推荐）

phrase.original: In most photo editors, the "Save" command saves the image over its original version, erasing that copy forever. PhotoDemon provides a "safer" option, where each save results in a new copy of the file.
phrase.translation: 在大多数照片编辑器中，“保存”命令会将图像保存在原始版本上，从而永远删除该副本。PhotoDemon提供了一个“更安全”的选项，每次保存都会产生一个新的文件副本。
建议当前文件名（标准行为）

phrase.original: suggest a new copy, e.g. "filename (2).jpg" (safe behavior)
phrase.translation: 建议新的副本，例如“filename（2）.jpg”（安全推荐）

phrase.original: In most photo editors, the "Save as" command defaults to the current filename. PhotoDemon also provides a "safer" option, where Save As will automatically increment filenames for you.
phrase.translation: 在大多数照片编辑器中，“另存为”命令默认为当前文件名。PhotoDemon还提供了一个“更安全”的选项，“另存为”将自动为在文件名上增加数字序号。

phrase.original: compress undo/redo data at the following level
phrase.translation: 按照下面的级别压缩undo/redo数据

phrase.original: when generating image and layer thumbnail images
phrase.translation: 生成图像和图层缩略图时

phrase.original: Some interface elements receive custom decorations (like drop shadows). On older PCs, these decorations can be suspended for a small performance boost.
phrase.translation: 一些界面控件有美化显示效果（如阴影）。在较旧的电脑上，可以禁用这些效果来小幅提高性能。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon generates many thumbnail images, especially when images contain multiple layers. Thumbnail quality can be lowered to improve performance.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon会生成许多缩略图，尤其是当图像包含多层时，可以降低缩略图质量以提高性能。

phrase.original: Rendering the primary image canvas is a common bottleneck for PhotoDemon's performance. The automatic setting is recommended, but for older PCs, you can manually select the Maximize Performance option to sacrifice quality for raw performance.
phrase.translation: 渲染主图像画布是PhotoDemon性能的常见瓶颈。建议使用自动设置。但对于较旧的电脑，您可以手动选择“最大化性能”选项，以牺牲质量换取性能。

phrase.original: Low compression settings require more disk space, but undo/redo operations will be faster. High compression settings require less disk space, but undo/redo operations will be slower. Undo data is erased when images are closed, so this setting only affects disk space while images are actively being edited.
phrase.translation: 低压缩设置需要更多磁盘空间，但撤消/重做操作会更快。高压缩设置需要较少的磁盘空间，但撤消/重做操作会较慢。关闭图像时，将删除撤消数据，因此该设置仅在正在编辑图像时占用磁盘空间。

phrase.original: use embedded ICC profiles, when available
phrase.translation: 使用嵌入式ICC配置文件（如果可用）

phrase.original: use the current system profiles for each display
phrase.translation: 使用每个显示器的当前系统配置文件

phrase.original: use custom profiles for each display
phrase.translation: 为每个显示使用自定义配置文件

phrase.original: use format-specific color management data, when available
phrase.translation: 使用特定格式的颜色管理数据（如果可用）
请选择一个颜色配置文件

phrase.original: Turning off display color management can provide a small performance boost. If your display is not currently configured for color management, use this setting.
phrase.translation: 关闭显示器颜色管理可以稍微提升性能，如果您的显示器当前未配置颜色管理，请使用此设置。

phrase.original: This setting is the best choice for most users. If you have no idea what color management is, use this setting. If you have correctly configured a display profile via the Windows Control Panel, also use this setting.
phrase.translation: 此设置适用于大多数用户的最佳选择。如果您不知道什么是色彩管理，使用此设置。如果您已经正确通过Windows控制面板配置显示配置文件，也可以使用此设置。

phrase.original: To configure custom color profiles on a per-monitor basis, please use this setting.
phrase.translation: 要在每个显示器的基础配置自定义颜色配置文件，请使用此设置。

phrase.original: Please specify a color profile for each monitor currently attached to the system. Note that the text in parentheses is the display adapter driving the named monitor.
phrase.translation: 请为当前连接到系统的每个显示器指定一个颜色配置文件。请注意，括号中的文本是显示适配器驱动提供的。

phrase.original: Click this button to bring up a "browse for color profile" dialog.
phrase.translation: 选择显示器的颜色配置文件。颜色配置文件(也称为ICC或ICM文件)包含一组设置,这些设置有助于校准颜色在显示器上的显示方式。

phrase.original: If you do not know what this setting controls, set it to "Perceptual". Perceptual rendering intent is the best choice for most users.
phrase.translation: 如果您不知道此设置的控制方式，请将其设置为“感知”。感知渲染是大多数用户的最佳选择。

phrase.original: BPC is primarily relevant in colorimetric rendering intents, where it helps preserve detail in dark (shadow) regions of images. For most workflows, BPC should be turned ON.
phrase.translation: BPC主要与色度渲染意图相关，它有助于保留图像暗（阴影）区域的细节。对于大多数工作流程，应打开BPC。

phrase.original: Embedded ICC profiles improve color fidelity. Even if this setting is turned off, PhotoDemon may still use ICC profiles for some tasks (like handling CMYK data).
phrase.translation: 嵌入式ICC配置文件提高了色彩保真度。即使关闭此设置，PhotoDemon仍可能将ICC配置文件用于某些任务（如处理CMYK数据）。

phrase.original: Some image formats support both ICC profiles and their own color management solutions. PhotoDemon always prefers ICC profiles, but when none are embedded, other color management approaches can be tried.
phrase.translation: 一些图像格式支持ICC配置文件和它们自己的颜色管理解决方案。PhotoDemon总是更喜欢ICC配置文件，但当没有嵌入时，可以尝试其他颜色管理方法。

phrase.original: notify when an update is ready

Because PhotoDemon is a portable application, it can only check for updates when the program is running. By default, PhotoDemon will check for updates whenever the program is launched, but you can reduce this frequency if desired.
phrase.translation: 因为PhotoDemon是一种便携式的应用程序，它只在程序运行时检查更新。默认情况下，PhotoDemon将在每次程序启动时检查更新。如果需要的话您可以降低这种频率。
稳定版、测试版和开发版（技术预览版）

phrase.original: One of the best ways to support PhotoDemon is to help test new releases. By default, PhotoDemon will suggest both stable and beta releases, but the truly adventurous can also try developer releases. (Developer releases give you immediate access to the latest program enhancements, but you might encounter some bugs.)
phrase.translation: 其中一个支持PhotoDemon的最佳方法是帮助测试新版本。默认情况下，PhotoDemon会建议使用稳定版和beta版，但如果想冒险您也可以尝试开发版（技术预览版）。（开发版让您立即获得最新的程序改进，但您也可能会遇到一些错误。）

phrase.original: PhotoDemon can notify you when it's ready to apply an update. This allows you to use the updated version immediately.
phrase.translation: 当PhotoDemon已经准备好更新版本时，会通知您。您可以立即使用更新的版本。

phrase.original:
You have placed PhotoDemon in a restricted system folder. Security precautions prevent PhotoDemon from modifying this folder, so automatic updates are now disabled. To restore them, you must move PhotoDemon to a non-admin folder, like Desktop, Documents, or Downloads.
(If you leave PhotoDemon where it is, please don't forget to visit photodemon.org from time to time to check for new versions.)
phrase.translation:
您已将PhotoDemon放置在受限制的系统文件夹中。安全预防措施可防止PhotoDemon修改此文件夹，因此自动更新现在已被禁用。要恢复它们，您必须将PhotoDemon移动到非管理文件夹，如桌面，文档或下载。
（如果您手头没有PhotoDemon，可以访问PhotoDemon.org网站检查是否有新版本。）

phrase.original:
The developers of PhotoDemon take privacy very seriously, so no information - statistical or otherwise - is uploaded during the update process. Updates simply involve downloading several small XML files from photodemon.org. These files contain the latest software, plugin, and language version numbers. If updated versions are found, and user preferences allow, the updated files are then downloaded and patched automatically.
If you still choose to disable updates, don't forget to visit photodemon.org from time to time to check for new versions.
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon开发者很重视隐私，所以更新过程不会上传个人信息或其他类似内容。更新只会从PhotoDemon.org下载几个小的XML文件。这些文件包含最新的软件，插件和语言的版本号。如果发现有更新的版本，并且发现有用户选项设置中允许更新的文件，软件会下载并自动更新。
如果您选择禁用更新，请访问PhotoDemon.org网站检查是否有新版本。

phrase.original: memory usage will be displayed here
phrase.translation: 内存的使用将会显示在这里

phrase.original: WARNING: this folder is invalid (access prohibited). Please provide a valid folder. If a new folder is not provided, PhotoDemon will use the system temp folder.
phrase.translation: 警告：这个文件夹无效（禁止访问）。请提供一个有效的文件夹。如果没有提供一个新的有效文件夹，PhotoDemon将使用系统临时文件夹。

phrase.original: This new temporary folder location will not take effect until you restart the program.
phrase.translation: 新的临时文件夹目录将在重新启动程序后生效。

phrase.original: In developer builds, debug data is automatically logged to the program's \Data\Debug folder. If you encounter bugs in a stable release, please manually activate this setting. This will help developers resolve your problem.
phrase.translation: 在开发人员构建中，调试数据会自动记录到程序的 \Data\Debug 文件夹中。如果您在稳定版本中遇到错误，请手动激活此设置。这将有助于开发人员解决您的问题。

phrase.original: max PhotoDemon memory usage this session
phrase.translation: 本次会话PhotoDemon使用最大内存

phrase.original: Click to select a new temporary folder.
phrase.translation: 单击以选中新的临时文件夹。

phrase.original: This button resets all PhotoDemon settings. If the program is behaving unexpectedly, this may resolve the problem.
phrase.translation: 此按钮可重置所有PhotoDemon设置。如果程序出现意外行为，重置设置可能会解决问题。

phrase.original: Changes will take effect the next time you start PhotoDemon.
phrase.translation: 更改将在下次启动PhotoDemon时生效。

phrase.original: When using Remote Desktop or a VM (Virtual Machine), high-resolution mouse input may not work correctly. This is a long-standing Windows bug. In these situations, you can use this setting to restore correct mouse behavior.
phrase.translation: 使用远程桌面或虚拟机时，高分辨率鼠标输入可能无法正常工作。这是一个长期存在的Windows问题，在这些情况下您可以使用此设置确保鼠标行为正确。

phrase.original: maximum number of recent files to remember
phrase.translation: 记录最近文件的最大数量
最近的文件名显示格式

phrase.original: Access keys (mnemonics) allow you to navigate menus using the keyboard. In "auto" mode, languages without native access keys will display the U.S. English access key for each menu.
phrase.translation: 访问键（助记符）允许您使用键盘导航菜单。在“自动”模式下，没有本机访问键的语言将显示每个菜单的美式英语访问键。

phrase.original: The "Recent Files" menu width is limited by Windows. To prevent this menu from overflowing, PhotoDemon can display image names only instead of full image locations.
phrase.translation: 在“最近的文件”菜单的宽度是由Windows的限制。为了防止溢出这个菜单，PhotoDemon可以用文件名替代文件完整路径。

phrase.original: obey auto-rotate instructions inside image files
phrase.translation: 根据图像文件内的元数据旋转图片方向

phrase.original: forcibly extract binary-type tags as Base64 (slow)
phrase.translation: 强制转换二进制标签为Base64（慢）

phrase.original: list PhotoDemon as the last-used editing software
phrase.translation: 将PhotoDemon列为最后使用的编辑软件

phrase.original: Older cameras and photo-editing software may not embed metadata correctly, leading to multiple metadata copies within a single file. PhotoDemon can automatically resolve duplicate entries for you.
phrase.translation: 较旧的相机和照片编辑软件可能无法正确嵌入元数据，从而导致单个文件中的存在多个元数据副本，PhotoDemon可以自动为您解决重复的条目。

phrase.original: The JPEG format does not provide a way to store JPEG quality settings inside image files. PhotoDemon can work around this by inferring quality settings from other metadata (like quantization tables).
phrase.translation: JPEG格式不提供在图像文件中存储JPEG质量设置的方法。PhotoDemon可以通过推断其他元数据（如量化表）的质量设置来解决这个问题。

phrase.original: Some camera manufacturers store proprietary metadata tags inside image files. These tags are not generally useful to humans, but PhotoDemon can attempt to extract them anyway.
phrase.translation: 一些相机制造商在图像文件中存储专有元数据标签，这些标签通常对个人无用，但PhotoDemon可以尝试提取它们。

phrase.original: By default, large binary tags (like image thumbnails) are not processed. Instead, PhotoDemon simply reports the size of the embedded data. If you require this data, PhotoDemon can manually convert it to Base64 for further analysis.
phrase.translation: 默认情况下，不处理大型二进制标记（如图像缩略图）。相反，PhotoDemon只是报告嵌入数据的大小。 如果您需要此数据，PhotoDemon可以手动将其转换为Base64格式以进行进一步分析。

phrase.original: Most digital photos include rotation instructions (EXIF orientation metadata), which PhotoDemon will use to automatically rotate photos. Some older smartphones and cameras may not write these instructions correctly, so if your photos are being imported sideways or upside-down, you can try disabling the auto-rotate feature.
phrase.translation: 大部分的数码照片包括旋转标记（EXIF元数据），PhotoDemon将使用它来自动旋转照片。一些老的智能手机和相机可能不正确设置方向，所以如果您的照片变成横向或倒置，您可以尝试禁用自动旋转功能。

phrase.original: The EXIF specification asks programs to correctly identify themselves as the software of origin when exporting image files. For increased privacy, you can suspend this behavior.
phrase.translation: EXIF规范要求程序在导出图像文件时正确地将自己标识为原始软件。为了保护隐私，您可以禁用此行为。
